summary: drivers: ethernet: cpsw: fix panic when interrupt coaleceing is set via ethtool
details:
drivers: ethernet: cpsw: fix panic when interrupt coaleceing is set via ethtool

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.19 by commit 459080fab12b23c0526026e5cedbf3fabb5457cc, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit d43c65b05b848e0b2db1a6c78b02c189da3a95b5. For more details please see the references link.
